title: HELP MY LOWER PRIORITY QUEUE KEEPS RESTARTING
body:
Hi,
I had to leave my most recent game due to an unprecedented event. Not my fault.
I have been put in the Low Priority Queue and every time somewhere in the middle of the timer it resets to 20 minutes.
Why is this happening? It is absolutely annoying and I haven't been able to start playing any games so far.
Please help me.
